views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9 to 13

With Gyration you can Enable the Rotation Over All the Applications, the LockScreen and HomeScreen on System Wide and also Manage More Rotation Features!

The Item is now out from the Stage of My Repository with also the adding of the Chance to Select in which User Applications the Rotation has to Work or not and with other Stuff, options and Improvements.

Configure options from Settings.

See Screenshots below.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.0.7 - Updated for iOS 13 Full Compatibility. - Added the option to Rotate Only the HomeScreen (Twitter Request). - Hopefully Fixed/Improved the Enable iPad Style Rotation option. Version 1.0.5
- Improvements:
Now enabling the Gyration Tweak only Activates the Rotation for iOS 9 and 10 Users, as Requested via Mail/Twitter.
Change in Prefs Labels.

- New Feature:
Now Added the Detached option to Enable the SplitView/SlideOver on iOS 9/10.
Version 1.0.3
- Extended the Full Compatibility Tweak Functionality also to iOS 9 (as Requested).
- Changes in Preferences Panel.

Version 1.0.2
- Added also the AppList System Applications Choice (as Requested).
- Extended the Tweak Functionality to iOS 10 (as Requested). Gyration Enables also the SplitView and the SlideOver Features on iOS 10.
- Changes in Preferences Panel.
